title: Login authentication fails
description: Users cannot authenticate with OAuth providers. Multiple reports from production.
businessImpact: Payment flow blocked - cannot process transactions

title: Search results pagination broken
description: Pagination on search results page skips items on page 2 and 3
businessImpact: Poor user experience affecting product discovery

title: API rate limiting too aggressive
description: API returns 429 errors even under normal load conditions

title: Mobile app crashes on iOS 17
description: App crashes on launch for iOS 17.2 and above. Critical for app store rating.
businessImpact: Cannot access app - blocks all iOS 17 users

title: Dashboard charts not rendering
description: D3.js charts fail to render on Firefox browser

title: Export CSV missing columns
description: CSV export missing last 3 columns of data

title: Payment retry logic fails
description: Failed payments not retrying as configured in settings

title: Memory leak in background worker
description: Worker process consuming excessive memory over time

title: UI button alignment off by 2px
description: Submit button misaligned on checkout page

title: Email notifications delayed
businessImpact: Customer complaints about delayed order confirmations
